posts.postText:
1) What position are you applying for:Moderator on TTT
2) Your age: 21
3) Your location: Georgia
4) Current In-Game Name: Luamerava
5) Steam ID & Link to your Steam Community Profile: http://steamcommunity.com/id/Dekanew47/
6) How did you find out about NNJG: I use to be a regular on NNJG Jail, Joster recommended me to TTT
7) How long have you been involved with NNJG and/or Shadow's servers: I have been involved for 7 months
8) What you can bring to the NNJG Team: The only thing I can being to the NNJG Team is moderation when there is no one else available.
9) Why do you want to be part of the NNJG Team: Besides the trolling and trucing, I've always loved the servers.
10) Do you have any past experience with the position you're applying for: Yes, I was a mod on BIT gaming before it went down.
11) Do you own a decent microphone, and do you frequently utilize it: Yes, I use my microphone all the time.
12) Any other comments or information you can provide: Getting 15 recommendations is going to be challenging, but I will try.

EDIT: I had help from Popl to get my screenshots lol
